topComments.author: Latha Santhosh
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Institui√ß√£o muito ruim e eles est√£o administrando a escola apenas para fins lucrativos, os pais devem ter muito cuidado antes de ingressar nesta escola Minha filha estava estudando nesta escola 2019-2020 por algum motivo pessoal n√≥s pedimos o certificado de transfer√™ncia 2019, mas eles n√£o est√£o prontos para dar o certificado de transfer√™ncia e exigem as taxas 30000 / - para o ano de 2020-2021 que n√£o compareceu para uma √∫nica aula online. Fomos √† escola para TC no m√°ximo 4 a 5 vezes, sem resposta adequada tamb√©m. Depois de tantas discuss√µes, eles n√£o est√£o dando ao TC, est√£o pensando que n√≥s, pais, somos pessoas tolas. H√° uma regra do governo que diz que tamb√©m podemos ingressar na escola sem o TC.  (Original) Very bad institution and they are runninng school only for earning purpose, parents be very careful before joining this school My daughter was studying in this school 2019-2020 due to some personal reason we asked for the transfer certificate 2019 itself  but they are not ready to give transfer certificate and demanding for the fees 30000/- for the year 2020-2021 which was not attend for a single online class . We have gone to school for TC max to max 4 to 5 times no proper response also. After soo many arguments they are not giving the TC  they are thinking we parents are foolish people.There is a rule from government that we can join for school without TC also.
